description: About Farm Credit Canada: Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is Canada’s leading agriculture and food lender, with a healthy loan portfolio of more than $47 billion. In 2019, as part of a larger Finance Transformation Initiative, we implemented SAP S/4 Hana 1809 (HEC managed cloud service)…
